text: Hey Ronaldo - I’m successfully creating contact to company associations via the API so that doesn’t sound right…
Are you using “Associate a contact with another object” from here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/contacts>
Hi, I am new to HubSpot API, I am having some struggles with getting started with OAuth and PHP, are there any examples you can share to help get me started? Thanks

Hi guys - We currently use V1 for getting a batch of contacts which says we can get 100 at a time. v3 says 10 at a time. Is there a plan to make that number larger for v3 or should we expect 10 to the new limit?
Just trying to be considerate of your rules and the customer's api threshholds for any give period

Hi <@UNDQNU056> Which endpoint are you referring to for V3? The limit is higher than 10 (I'd guess it'd be closer to 100) for the "Read a batch of contacts by internal ID" (/crm/v3/objects/contacts/batch/read). I think the batch limit of 10 you're referring to is in relation to create / update / archive only.
